body.name: wirarpa Women's Cotton Underwear High Waist Breathable Briefs Soft Underpants Ladies Stretch Panties 4 Pack
features: SOFT & COMFORTABLE COTTON FABRIC: Soft stretch women's cotton underwear, No sagging, no binding or pilling.The panties don't dig into skin or stretch out. The seam lines are smooth and don't irritate.No deformation after washing or drying.

STRETCHY FABRIC COVERED WAISTBAND: Full coverage high waisted underwear, Soft stretchy DOUBLE-LAYER fabric covered waistband that stays in place at the waist.No rolling or bunching , not too tight or loose but perfectly snuggish. Comfy low cut underpants brings no wedgies.Reduces the appearance of muffin top and make you more charming.

BREATHABLE DOUBLE-LAYER CROTCH:Women's underpants with wide breathable crotch for added protection, sweat wicking, breathable and healthy.Leg openings for chafe free comfort , No ride up with any type of movement. Multiple color options brings lots of joy to your daily life. Suitable for home, bedtime and everyday use.

BEST DESIGN & PERFECT WORKMANSHIP : Colorful ladies panties seems very fashion and charming, fit for all of the Female friends/mothers/grandmas.Comfy full back coverage design perfect for suffering low back pain and sedentary in office. Offers enough support for postpartum c section recovery. Reduces the appearance of muffin top with no rolling down or digging. Easy on and easy off undies. Work great with high waisted jeans.
We always expect your inquiry and support. Please let us know if there's any question. Your suggestion will help us to improve products and provide more great products.
body.description: wirarpa Women's Cotton Underwear High Waisted Briefs Perfect Fit, Perfect Feel We are sensitive and picky to underwear since they are the first thing we put on every day and the closest thing for us.So we welcome every suggestion and fine tune every piece to ensure higher quality fabric, form fitting construction and better workmanship.This underwear will provide you soft, comfortable cotton underwear panties with enough stretch, high waist and full coverage design. No ride up, no rolling down-you don't feel them at all when walking around. Superior combed cotton spandex fabric Stay put fabric covered waistband Full coverage and high waist panties Easy to wash and dry Suitable for postpartum c-section recovery

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cotton, Cute, Classy, Colorful & Comfy!
reviews.reviewText: Loving the Modern style vibe these cotton panties offer to my undies’ drawers! I find these a refreshing new look for sporty cotton essentials. These wash nicely and I just always air dry my panties but did have one pair go through the dryer by mistake and fortunately no shrinkage. I highly recommend for real women, 60 and after injuries I weigh 185. These are perfect in xxl

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality, Great Fit
reviews.reviewText: This is my second package of these panties I've ordered. I love them! They are soooo comfortable and the material is soft and high quality. The sizing is perfect and they fit very well. I'd give them even more stars if I could.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SUPERIOR FIT AND QUALITY
reviews.reviewText: These underwear are AMAZING! The price is a little high compared to the value packs you can buy at your local store but in this case you get what you pay for. The size chart was spot on and a perfect fit. No more creeping, riding, pinching, bunching in places that make me feel uncomfortable. I do not need to fix or adjust them because they migrated. I absolutely love the wide waist band. They are soft but thick while not being too thick to create sweat. They are breathable. Hold up well in the wash. I washed on warm/cool and dried on low. They did not shrink or get damaged in any way. I feel covered and comfortable at all times. I love the colors. I am on a weight-loss journey so when I eventually need a smaller size, I will definitely be purchasing these again. These are the best underwear I have ever owned and I have never said that about underwear before. Will be tossing all my other lower quality cheap underwear. This product has everything I was looking for. THANK YOU!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE these! Immediately ordered more after a positive "see how they fit & feel" experience
reviews.reviewText: These briefs are WONDERFUL! I have been wearing another brand of high-cut cotton briefs for over 12 years but could no longer find them to fit me as before due to the "sizing up" that's happening in the clothing industry. Example: those briefs were a Size 6. Now the exact same briefs in a "6" are huge on me and a size 4 is non-existent, so ... I was forced to find a replacement that would fit my slender body, and also be styled the same. (I weigh 97lbs and my fanny is pretty flat.)Found this Wirapa brand on Amazon. I read many of the reviews and decided to order them in XS-size because I figured a "Small" would be too big for me (based on what I explained above.) Surprisingly the "XS" was a little too snug. I returned them thanks to Amazon's easy return policy and ordered the "Small" and Perfecto! I've ordered these (2) more times and LOVE them. I LOVE how they fit. The material is buttery-soft, I love the overall styling, the sewing on these is top-notch, and the wide waistband really feels great. I recommend them 100%.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is my 2nd order of this product. The fit is beautiful and feels wonderful under anything from jeans to leggings. I did order up a size and so happy I did.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit comfortable.
reviews.reviewText: I love this you’re a perfect fit they’re comfortable I like the colors I like the quality and again they’re perfect fit they wash nice you don’t shrink I like them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are cotton, lightly supportive and comfortable. They seem to be made well and the colors are nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Comfortable, Durably Constructed, Excellent Fit
reviews.reviewText: After being disappointed by trusted name brands… after paying big money for their underpants that rolled down to my hips, or fell apart, moments after I wore them for the first time, I was delighted to have found these!They come in a wide range of sizes and colors. The plus size I ordered fits me perfectly and I will be ordering more.Now, I no longer need to perform embarrassing waistband adjustments in public, or excuse myself to a private room to pull up my underwear from around my upper thighs, where they should not have fallen in the first place.I don’t dislike these, and I more than just like them.In fact, I love them so much, I am ready to throw away all my other underwear, including the few, newer ones, that haven’t fallen apart yet!These are the only kind I want to buy from now on.
I absolutely love them! They are so comfortable and well made! Best underwear ever! They fit so good! I am definitely ordering more ! Good quality and great price! Good value for the money!
Sitzen super, fühlen sich auch gut an

reviews.reviewTitle: Idéal pour le sport et pour les journées de mouvement
reviews.reviewText: J'ai commandé ce produit car il convient à ma personnalité toujours en mouvement. Très confortable. Je recommanderai le produit tant pour de futures clientes que pour une commande personnelle
Actual size is smaller than it described on the size chart. Very tight and thick elastic band on the waist line. Big disappointment.
